name: historization
description: A historization service responsible for persisting info

scripts.sentry: cross-env SENTRY_PROJECT=$npm_package_name sentry-cli releases new $npm_package_version && cross-env SENTRY_PROJECT=$npm_package_name sentry-cli releases files $npm_package_version upload-sourcemaps --rewrite ./build && cross-env SENTRY_PROJECT=$npm_package_name sentry-cli releases finalize $npm_package_version
scripts.start: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT=./ NODE_OPTIONS=--trace-warnings node -r tsconfig-paths/register build/index.js
scripts.start:ts: cross-env DEBUG=app::* NODE_OPTIONS=--trace-warnings ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register --files src/index.ts
